name: a game maybe
description:
This is the first game I've ever programed. Everything was created within five days, so by no means is this a complete project. pls enjoy :~)

Game Controls:

  • WASD & Arrow keys for movement
  • Space/W/Up for jump
  • Shift to flip character
  • Press 1 to restart the game 
  • Press 2 to restart the level 

Credit to Vinland for all music !!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTxrUnx_mt9ad_F9qKMFXwQ
